requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: 2.8GHz Dual-Core CPU
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GTX 1070 or AMD Radeon RX 590 8GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.8GHz Multicore CPU
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GTX 1070 or AMD Radeon RX 590 8GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
